1.text: Wipe off your shoes with a damp cloth.

2.text: Mix 1 teaspoon (4.9 mL) of laundry detergent with 1 cup (240 mL) of water.

3.text: Dip your toothbrush in the mix and scrub the soles of your shoes.

4.text: Wipe off the soles of your shoes with a towel.

5.text: Mix 1 teaspoon (4.9 mL) of detergent with 1 cup (240 mL) of water.

6.text: Dip a clean toothbrush in the mixture and spot scrub your shoes.

7.text: Use a damp sponge to wipe off the soap.

9.text: Mix 1 part bleach and 5 parts water together.

10.text: Dip a clean toothbrush into your mixture and scrub your shoes.

11.text: Rinse your shoes with warm water.

12.text: Let your shoes air dry before using them.
